mapper.select: SELECT user.fullname AS username, user.id, message.createTime, message.content FROM message INNER JOIN conversation ON message.cnId = conversation.id AND conversation.topic = #{topic} AND conversation.deleteFlg = '0' INNER JOIN user ON message.urID = user.id AND user.deleteFlg = '0' WHERE message.deleteFlg = '0' ORDER BY message.createTime DESC LIMIT 0, #{number}
